exTitle.description: The extension name displayed in titels and texts.

exSubTitle.description: The extension subtitle displayed following after the exTitel in some titels and texts.

workdayStart.description: The first time to display for a workday.

workdayEnd.description: The first time to display for a workday.

defaultLogStart.description: The time a defaulty workday starts.

defaultLogEnd.description: The time when a default workday ends.

defaultLabel.description: The default label to set on a time-log

save.description: Displayed on a button that triggers the save action.

newMark.description: Displayed on a button that adds a new time marking.

createLabel.description: Displayed next to a field where a label can be added.
